channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Russian operatives are targeting Tim Walz, spreading viral disinformation about his time as a teacher
item.description: Digital researchers had already linked the video to Russia, but this is the first time federal authorities have confirmed the connection.

item.title: McDonald’s president is confident you can still ‘enjoy the classics,’ despite ongoing investigation of E. coli outbreak from the famed Quarter Pounders
item.description: The CDC's ongoing investigation has documented 49 cases, 10 hospitalizations, and one death across 10 states.

item.title: Boeing unveils $6 billion quarterly loss ahead of key vote by striking workers
How trolls, lawsuits and layoffs led to 'trust and safety winter' for misinformation before election
item.description: Misinformation researchers say they are facing a more treacherous landscape this election season than in the past, fueled by online trolls and lawsuit...

item.title: Why Nextdoor’s founder moved back into the company C-suite
item.description: It's essential that CEOs step back and 'harmonize...the evolution of your company with the evolution of what's going on outside,' said Nextdoor CEO Ni...

item.title: Existing-home sales sink to a 14-year low, as home buyers pull back
European Central Bank policymakers split on the need for jumbo interest rate cuts
item.description: Policymakers at the European Central Bank are split on the need to consider a jumbo half-point interest rate cut in December.

item.title: AI on the trading floor: Morgan Stanley expands OpenAI-powered chatbot tools to Wall Street division
item.description: Nearly 50% of employees at Morgan Stanley and 60% at JPMorgan Chase have access to generative AI software provided by OpenAI.

item.title: The case for the S&P 500 to rally to 6,600
item.description: Stocks are experiencing some turbulence of late, but the longer-term outlook points to sharp gains ahead, according to Piper Sandler.

item.title: Mark Cuban says Donald Trump is not Kamala Harris’ main rival anymore—it’s Elon Musk
item.description: Elon Musk takes lead in Republican race to presidency.

item.title: UK's ruling Labour Party rejects accusations of U.S. election interference
item.description: The U.K.'s ruling Labour Party has rejected accusations by Donald Trump's campaign team that its party members have interfered in the U.S. election.

item.title: Rising insurance costs are another storm gathering over commercial real estate
With JetBlue out of the picture, Frontier and Spirit Airlines are once again discussing a merger—two years after their $2.9 billion deal fell through
item.description: The two carriers have held off-and-on discussions since 2016.

item.title: Tesla earnings are the ‘next big thing’ for the EV maker — live updates
Coca-Cola beats on profit, as a big price increase offsets a surprise volume dip
